c74object.name: mlmat.mean_shift
c74object.description: Mean-shift clustering. A fast implementation of mean-shift clustering using dual-tree range search. Given a dataset, this uses the mean shift algorithm to produce and return a clustering of the data.

attribute.name: force_convergence
attribute.digest: If specified, the mean shift algorithm will continue running regardless of max_iterations until the clusters converge
attribute.description: If specified, the mean shift algorithm will continue running regardless of max_iterations until the clusters converge. (default = 0)

attribute.name: radius
attribute.digest: If the distance between two centroids is less than the given radius, one will be removed
attribute.description: If the distance between two centroids is less than the given radius, one will be removed. A radius of 0 or less means an estimate will be calculated and used for the radius. (default = 0.)

attribute.name: max_iterations
attribute.digest: Maximum number of iterations before k-means terminates
attribute.description: Maximum number of iterations before k-means terminates. (default = 1000)
